Lunarpine was toured through the three ships by Veratis it was an 
impressive display. The lab was off limits to the wolf due to the 
need for secrecy.

"So why did you choose this planet to explore?" Lunarpine asked full 
of curiosity. 

"This particular planet has an abundance of life, Translife and 
organic life seemed to have molded into a new translife form. Truly 
you must marvel in the works of nature here." Veratis replied, his 
voice full of wonderment. "Imagine the possibilities of organic 
transformation, if we could program the stasis pods with DNA it would 
make scanners obsolete. We could land explorers on planetsvoid of 
life with the abilities of creatures from similar planets. It will be 
a new age for exploration and colinazation.

Lunarpine could see the good purpose in what Veratis was doing but 
unfortunately he could imagine other possibilities too. If he could 
imagine them he was sure that others such as the preds could think of 
them too.
